xt:extension.xt:name: DILA AI Markup
xt:extension.xt:description:
This plugin provides an AI-empowered markup assistant for editing TEI XML documents.
Features: * AI-driven markup for unmarked references * TEI tag removal * multi-language support (English, Simplified Chinese) * Preferences dialog (pending implementation)
